verses.text: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah , that \add was\add* the first year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon ;
The which Jeremiah the prophet spake unto all the people of Judah , and to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem , saying ,

From the thirteenth year of Josiah the son of Amon king of Judah , even unto this day , that \add is\add* the three and twentieth year , the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath come unto me, and I have spoken unto you, rising early and speaking ; but ye have not hearkened.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath sent unto you all his servants the prophets , rising early and sending \add them;\add* but ye have not hearkened , nor inclined your ear to hear.

They said , Turn ye again now every one from his evil way , and from the evil of your doings , and dwell in the land that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath given unto you and to your fathers for ever and ever :
And go not after other gods to serve them, and to worship them, and provoke me not to anger with the works of your hands ; and I will do you no hurt.
Yet ye have not hearkened unto me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; that ye might provoke me to anger with the works of your hands to your own hurt. \p
¶ Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Because ye have not heard my words ,

Behold, I will send and take all the families of the north , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and Nebuchadrezzar the king of Babylon , my servant , and will bring them against this land , and against the inhabitants thereof, and against all these nations round about , and will utterly destroy them, and make them an astonishment , and an hissing , and perpetual desolations.

Moreover I will take from them the voice of mirth , and the voice of gladness , the voice of the bridegroom , and the voice of the bride , the sound of the millstones , and the light of the candle.\f + \fr 25.10 \ft I will…: Heb. I will cause to perish from them\f*
And this whole land shall be a desolation , \add and\add* an astonishment ; and these nations shall serve the king of Babylon seventy years. \p

¶ And it shall come to pass, when seventy years are accomplished , \add that\add* I will punish the king of Babylon , and that nation , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for their iniquity , and the land of the Chaldeans , and will make it perpetual desolations.\f + \fr 25.12 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*
And I will bring upon that land all my words which I have pronounced against it, \add even\add* all that is written in this book , which Jeremiah hath prophesied against all the nations.
For many nations and great kings shall serve themselves of them also: and I will recompense them according to their deeds , and according to the works of their own hands. \p
¶ For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel unto me; Take the wine cup of this fury at my hand , and cause all the nations , to whom I send thee, to drink it.
And they shall drink , and be moved , and be mad , because of the sword that I will send among them.

Then took I the cup at the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hand , and made all the nations to drink , unto whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had sent me:

\add To wit\add*, Jerusalem , and the cities of Judah , and the kings thereof, and the princes thereof, to make them a desolation , an astonishment , an hissing , and a curse ; as \add it is\add* this day ;
Pharaoh king of Egypt , and his servants , and his princes , and all his people ;
And all the mingled people, and all the kings of the land of Uz , and all the kings of the land of the Philistines , and Ashkelon , and Azzah , and Ekron , and the remnant of Ashdod ,
Edom , and Moab , and the children of Ammon ,
And all the kings of Tyrus , and all the kings of Zidon , and the kings of the isles which \add are\add* beyond the sea ,\f + \fr 25.22 \ft isles: or, region by the sea side\f*
Dedan , and Tema , and Buz , and all \add that are\add* in the utmost corners ,\f + \fr 25.23 \ft that…: Heb. cut off into corners, or, having the corners of the hair polled\f*
And all the kings of Arabia , and all the kings of the mingled people that dwell in the desert ,
And all the kings of Zimri , and all the kings of Elam , and all the kings of the Medes ,

And all the kings of the north , far and near , one with another , and all the kingdoms of the world , which \add are\add* upon the face of the earth : and the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.

Therefore thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Drink ye, and be drunken , and spue , and fall , and rise no more, because of the sword which I will send among you.
And it shall be, if they refuse to take the cup at thine hand to drink , then shalt thou say unto them, Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Ye shall certainly drink.

For, lo, I begin to bring evil on the city which is called by my name , and should ye be utterly unpunished ? Ye shall not be unpunished : for I will call for a sword upon all the inhabitants of the earth , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.\f + \fr 25.29 \ft which…: Heb. upon which my name is called\f* \p

Therefore prophesy thou against them all these words , and say unto them, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall roar from on high , and utter his voice from his holy habitation ; he shall mightily roar upon his habitation ; he shall give a shout , as they that tread \add the grapes\add*, against all the inhabitants of the earth.

A noise shall come \add even\add* to the ends of the earth ; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath a controversy with the nations , he will plead with all flesh ; he will give them \add that are\add* wicked to the sword , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , Behold, evil shall go forth from nation to nation , and a great whirlwind shall be raised up from the coasts of the earth.

And the slain of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be at that day from \add one\add* end of the earth even unto the \add other\add* end of the earth : they shall not be lamented , neither gathered , nor buried ; they shall be dung upon the ground. \p

¶ Howl , ye shepherds , and cry ; and wallow yourselves \add in the ashes\add*, ye principal of the flock : for the days of your slaughter and of your dispersions are accomplished ; and ye shall fall like a pleasant vessel.\f + \fr 25.34 \ft the days…: Heb. your days for slaughter\f*\f + \fr 25.34 \ft a pleasant…: Heb. a vessel of desire\f*
And the shepherds shall have no way to flee , nor the principal of the flock to escape.\f + \fr 25.35 \ft the shepherds…: Heb. flight shall perish from the shepherds, and escaping from, etc\f*
A voice of the cry of the shepherds , and an howling of the principal of the flock , \add shall be heard:\add* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath spoiled their pasture.
And the peaceable habitations are cut down because of the fierce anger of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
He hath forsaken his covert , as the lion : for their land is desolate because of the fierceness of the oppressor , and because of his fierce anger.\f + \fr 25.38 \ft desolate: Heb. a desolation\f*
